DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , non-randomized , multicenter Phase 2 study MEDI4736 three non-comparative cohort : Cohort A : 37 subject newly diagnose unmethylated MGMT GBM receive MEDI4736 every 2 week combination standard radiotherapy . Cohort B : 30 bevacizumab-naïve subject recurrent GBM receive MEDI4736 every 2 week monotherapy . Cohort B2 : 32 bevacizumab-naïve subject recurrent GBM receive MEDI4736 every 2 week + bevacizumab every 2 week ( 10 mg/kg ) . Cohort B3 : 32 bevacizumab-naïve subject recurrent GBM receive MEDI4736 every 2 week + bevacizumab every 2 week ( 3 mg/kg ) . Cohort C : 17 bevacizumab-refractory subject recurrent GBM receive MEDI4736 every 2 week combination continue bevacizumab .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study MEDI4736 Patients With Glioblastoma
